Summer drownings: Kayaker survives capsize in Wellington Harbour, talks lessons https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/summer-drownings-kayaker-survives-capsize-in-wellington-harbour-talks-lessons/UQNE5ZE2FNFOFNRZ75GQR4OMP4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/summer-drownings-kayaker-survives-capsize-in-wellington-harbour-talks-lessons/UQNE5ZE2FNFOFNRZ75GQR4OMP4/ Cherie HowieHis kayak flipped, his lifejacket broke and his phone sank - how did Chris Casey survive? Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:01:00 +0000 We love the summer, and we love the water - but too many are needlessly losing their lives to drowning. That's prompted Chris Casey, pictured at Lake Manapouri, to talk about how he nearly died after capsizing while kayaking in Wellington Harbour.
